title: Upgrade the usage of zookeeper in our code
description:
Zookeeper 3.4.9 brings in a lot of stability improvements (http://zookeeper.apache.org/releases.html) and
Solr guide is still recommending zookeeper 3.4.6 (https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/solr/Setting+Up+an+External+ZooKeeper+Ensemble)

We should upgrade the usage of zookeeper in our code.

comments.author: Kevin Risden
comments.content: There is an existing issue about updating Zookeeper.
